Html:
this illustration hopefully conveys my challenge to someone who might also be trying to use the Dynamic Display code within a Microsoft Patterns and Practices Prism modular architecture?

When I try to include code and assembly references within a Prism module, I just can't get things to work.  With the System.Windows 'Point' struct as per the illustration, is it because DD3 is using System assembly v2.0.50727 and the Prism Quickstarts use v4.0.30319 ?  Or am I completely in the wrong namespace?

For the PRISM quickstarts I'm using ModularityWithUnity.Desktop  and for the DD3 sample I'm using SimulationSample

Thank you,

Greg
